The lights...all 10 of them are working fine now and the new batteries have been in them for weeks. I guess it's a good example of 'you get what you pay for.' The new batteries I bought cost a bit more than double but have already given me 10X more value.

name: Alex
title: What happened Amazon?
review: Batteries did not last. From the beginning, no power. Will be requesting a refund and not opening the AA batteries.

name: Cynthia Jones
title: Batteries need a better price
review: I thought it would be more for the price but I see that it wasn't looking at itlooking at it on the internet it made you think that you had a bigger box I was surprised how small the box was when it arrived considering the price I would not be perking this any longer again

name: JC
title: Batteries were dead before I even used them
review: Just about every one of these batteries were dead before I even used them, about a month after purchase. Usually happy with Amazon Basics products, but beware the batteries.Editing to add: The same thing happened with the pack of AA batteries! Coming up on the brunt of hurricane season around here and I have no faith in these products whatsoever. I'll be putting my faith on other batteries from now on!

name: mommysbored2
title: So far, so good
review: Bought these for some battery operated Christmas lights, so far so good. Easy to install and store like the named branded batteries. Quality is there.

name: MB.5
title: A Bargain and Long Lasting
review: I am so glad that I came across these batteries from Amazon. They last much longer than the expensive name brands that I have been purchasing almost every two weeks for my computer mouse. And... they work very well. You cannot beat the price, but most of all they work.

name: Aarron cassell
title: I don‚Äôt think they‚Äôd keep the energize bunny going for long.
review: I bought these and they‚Äôre good for the price but they don‚Äôt last long. Maybe it‚Äôs just me? But I have older batteries in things and have had to replace these more than once

name: Becky RomslandAmazon Customer
title: Awesome batteries and price!
review: I‚Äôm always so happy to receive these batteries because you simply can‚Äôt beat the price and quality of these batteries! We go through a lot of batteries around here!

name: Arun
title: Less expensive but good one overall
review: These are less expensive but meets my needs.. it works fine with all my remote controls.. just gave 3 stars for longevity since I started using this couple if weeks back.. hope this lasts long

name: shanliang
title: good
review: Use the batteries for my truck! Lasted a lot longer than I expected, usually don't purchase but I will definitely reconsider! The packaging of the Duracell definitely has a upgrade and looks a lot better!

name: Stan
title: Just as good as the "name brand" batteries
review: Why spend more on "name brand" batteries when you can save some hard earned dollars and get these Amazon branded batteries. I have no compliants and will buy again when they eventually run out.

name: Matthew
title: These suck! Just like the rest of Amazon!
review: These are terrible!!!!They lasted 3 months in a remote I use for a couple hours every other evening! üëéüèª

name: DogsGalore
title: Lasts about a day
review: Says these do not expire til 2029. Just in ONE week, I have replaced these AA battery‚Äôs four times in a TV remote that never lights up or uses voice activation! Just a simple remote. These batteries have been a nightmare. I can only imagine if it was for a child‚Äôs toy!

name: Bill Martin
title: You get what you pay for
review: I use AAA batteries in a blood pressure cupAnd the work just fineBut I‚Äôm not happy seeing their made in ChinaNext time I‚Äôll buy USA

name: Lindsay
title: fine battery
review: I have not had any issues using amazon brand things. This was a good deal for batteries and everything was there and working good. I got the AAA pack

name: Amazon Customer
title: Such high quality batteries!
review: I love these batteries. It is such a relief to find high quality batteries for such a reasonable price! I‚Äôve used them in toys, remotes, flashlights, etc. and they last for a really long time! I definitely recommend ordering these!

name: DELMA LOZANO
title: Great batteries
review: THESE BATTERIES DO AN EXCELLENT JOB FOR ME. I have problems with lights so I use Candles. With timers My eyes are very sensitive to lights so these helps me and the batteries are great I use all sizes of the Amazon Batteries.

name: jeff
title: 1/6 the longevity of Duracell
review: The life of these batteries is terrible. I use them for my front door keypad lock and they are lasting about 2 to 4 weeks. Duracell‚Äôs were lasting 6 months. Not worth the savings if I have to keep replacing them, door won‚Äôt lock once they lose their charge to prevent locking yourself out so it‚Äôs a pain to be on the way out and have to stop and replace them every few weeks.

name: kr36303
title: Excellent Battery Value
review: I bought these batteries after seeing a youtube video that rated five or six of the most popular alkaline batteries. There performed very well and were very close to the top of the rankings. The youtube video was very well done with professional equipment to test the battery output and total energy stored for each brand. And it had a value ranking based on performance. It would be well worth your time to watch the video before you buy batteries but these were by far the best value.

name: Dr. Tony
title: Good so far.
review: These batteries power my lights and have lasted a long time. And I reorder the same kind.

name: Joseph Ashby
title: Wrong package to wrong address
review: product may be ok, but I may never know as the package I received was not addressed to me or even at the same street address. I took it down the street to ANOTHER street where it belonged, and I may never know what happened to MY package.

name: nyamulani
title: Last a long time.
review: They stay for a long time, I use them in my remote control. The price was good, I am glad I bought them. When I finish this package I will buy more.

name: Vic Barber
title: Very satisfied
review: The AmazonBasics batteries are just as good if not better than the name brand batteries at nowhere near the cost. I have been very happy using them.

name: Jullie Flaugher
title: Great value for your money
review: Works great for almost everything...not so good for high powered things like RC cars though.

name: William
title: Great value for the money
review: With the amount of batteries for the money we spent, we don't have to worry about running out of batteries again. I always struggle with going to the drugs store to buy small pack of battery everytime we run out. With the same amount of money, I can get so much more using the Amazon brand. Very reliable battery! Definitely recommend!

name: Ryan
title: Terrible batteries
review: These batteries are terrible. Our local grocery store had their own brand but the price went up. Thought I would try these instead but they don't last long at all. These are not worth the money, go buy a store brand instead!

name: Jenn Mehrtens
title: Batteries DO NOT WORK in my remote!!
review: I bought these for a mirror, batteries died within a week. They don't even work in my firestick remote. What a rip off! I tried to get a refund and they say its returnless. So disappointed :(

name: Michele M Wecker
title: Great value!
review: We have repeatedly bought these for controllers and camping items, as well as certain office products. I store them in the fridge. We are delighted with the quality and price. I highly recommend this line of batteries.

name: sondra ernst
title: Die almost immediately
review: I bought 20 of these in August for my remote controls and I have already used 14 of them. I usually change my remote batteries once every couple of years, but I have just changed them for the third time in two months. Think about it. Junk.

name: Hong Dexter
title: Affordable
review: I had some duds in the mix of batteries. That‚Äôs my only complaint. They last just as long as any other brand. Also sometimes comes unpackaged.

name: W T
title: Great Product for Everyday Usage- Beats out name brands at twice the price!
review: Recieved the product promptly by Amazon, prior to using the Amazon Basic brand I would purchse the Maxwell. Altough a great product the price point on Amazon Basics was superior and the quality appears to be lasting longer than the Maxwell brand. I would compare these to other name brands. I have children that have every gaming device known it seems and the lentgh of usage is holding up to daily use. Great product and like the idea of anti-corrosion components and new zinc composition resulting in 10-years anti-leakage. I've used this in professional photography flashes and they are holding up well after several flash responses that need to generate a higher than normal recovery rate. Amazon did well, highly recommend the purchase.

name: joe
title: Dont waste your money
review: Honestly they don't last long. They lo literally lasted a week in my remote control and I dont even watch that much tv. I wont purchase them again.

name: Maureen
title: worth what your pay
review: Great for value

name: David Harris
title: Buyer beware - DOA out of the box
review: Half of the batteries in a box of 20 were completely dead right out of the box when brand new. What‚Äôs even worse is that this is Amazon‚Äôs own brand of batteries. My advice, buy a better brand of batteries at an actual store, not from Amazon. I have never once had this issue from store bought batteries of any brand, name brand or generic.

name: Carlos Rivero
title: Dissapointed
review: Yes, this batteries are super cheap in comparation with another brands but in my case, they didn't last as long as they should, which is the most important thing in this kind of item.

name: tracy d metcalf
title: These batteries suck
review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. ¬†I had to purchase more batteries because the Amazon brand i bought keeps dying after the using them for a day or two.

name: Stitch
title: Great batteries
review: I purchased these batteries and I find them to be very good when it comes to replacing my remote control batteries for my 4 Television sets around the house.

name: Katie Buckner
title: P
review: Used in the million baby toys around the house that require batteries. Haven‚Äôt had to replace any yet & have been used daily for a couple months, so longevity is pretty good. Don‚Äôt spend extra money on brand name batteries, these work great!

name: Elise
title: These batteries don't last in storage.
review: After sitting in a cool drawer for 2 years (unopened) these batteries are dead. Based on the expiration date on the package, these should have lasted to 2028. Lame.

name: Michelle Richardson
title: Math?
review: Hmmm...package states 36, but by my calculations, 8 packs of 4, always equals 32.

name: Claudia Larsson
title: Dead batteries!
review: It seems like not all the batteries work! I now have 5 out of the pack that are dead. I just recently opened! I‚Äôd like someone to contact me please!!

name: Kenny
title: Not very Bright
review: About as bright as a small key chain light and the magnet, cannot even hold itself sideways on a toolbox.....just slides down and down gaining speed until crashing onto floor lol....weak magnet, dim light.Light dim enough it wouldn't even attract bugs. Oh, and I did put new batteries in it thinking that was it....nope just as dim.

name: Amazon Customer
title: They are ok
review: They last half the time of brand name battery and ends up costing more. I used in flashlight, headlight. Cat toys. They worked ok for remote. Been two months and still working in remote

name: Natalie
title: As good as the name brand batteries!
review: I love these batteries. They are a great deal compared to the name brand batteries. They last just as long and I‚Äôve never had any issues with them.

name: Kim T
title: Leaky batteries!
review: Do not buy Amazon brand batteries. They leak terribly and if they don‚Äôt, they don‚Äôt last long!! 10 year shelf life is a bogus claim!! See photos.

name: Kimberly K
title: We will continue to buy
review: We buy these in different sizes and they are a great value. They last as long and run our electronics as well as the more expensive name brands.

name: Todds Books
title: A good choice for devices that require very frequent battery changes
review: In longevity tests, these batteries outlast Duracell's standard Coppertop battery by about 15%. If you have RC toys or other devices that use lots of batteries quickly, these may be your best bet in cost per battery.

name: Stephanie
title: Love Them!
review: I love AmazonBasics batteries, and these are no exception. The package is easy to open, and the batteries are neatly bound in sets of 4. Most devices use an even number of batteries, so this really helps. You only open what you need, and leave the rest safely stored in the box. So far, every battery I have used works. I can't comment on how long they last, as I just opened these within the last few days.

name: Hockeyman30
title: Just as good as name brand
review: I buy these all the time. Just as good as brand name and I actually think they last longer. You get more batteries for your money and the same good quality.

name: Pleased
title: Great value Very happy
review: Great value & very happy. Last as long as the expensive big name guys batteries, I have not found a defective one because I test the majority before I use them.

name: Hello Kitty
title: Great value
review: Great value for your money I needed these for my fire stick remote and I haven't had to change them in months like I had with other batteries in the past.

name: Rob Wehrli
title: Buy in bulk and get prime delivery
review: These seem to do the job very nicely. I use these in a wide variety of devices and they seem just as useful as the 'brand' names that cost much more. I now buy these in all cell sizes so that there is always a reasonable supply on-hand.

name: Tamara Davis
title: Sooooooo many AAA batteries
review: No one needs this many AAA batteries. I only needed 2 but this was the best value for the money. The rest will likely go bad. Appreciate the price though. Just have 34 extra batteries.

name: AmazonCustomer630
title: Good value priced pack of alkaline batteries
review: Normally we will only ever use Rayovac alkaline batteries however these are also good alkaline batteries for the price in a value priced pack. We had ours for one full year before ever opening the box to use them and they work great.

name: smgu3
title: Batteries leak
review: Purchased in October 2019 I went to use some in April 2020 and found several leaked. Go to show ya get what u pay for! Suppose to be good till 11-2028. No way. Wish I could add the photos.

name: KLL
title: Great Quality
review: I like these for three reasons:1. Amazon always sells these for a good price. They are a lot cheaper than Duracell or Energizer.2. They last just as long as other name brands.3. I have NEVER had an issue with leaking batteries from AmazonBasics.I will continue to buy these as long as they are offered!

name: val
title: All remote are this size
review: I bought a pack due to mostly all the house remote is this size! Rather have extra battery at home then keep going back to the store and buying it

name: JJ
title: Reliable batteries
review: Great batteries, best value that I could find. Hopefully it'll last for 10 years on shelf. It seems comparable to duracell and the big name batteries

name: cool in Rocklin
title: I wasn't sure because I've always been a duracell girl
review: Nobody is more surprised than me but these batteries are really good. They last really long and the price is really good. I have them now in AA, AAA, D, C, and 9 volt.

name: Koala
title: Last long and great price!
review: Never will I buy another expensive name brand battery! Amazon's batteries last very long, and even longer than the expensive name brand companies! Loved the price and the quality has come out to be long lasting!

name: James Fyfe
title: I replaced the batteries with energizers and the remote control worked fine. Then I checked to make sure I just ...
review: These batteries don't work in all devices. I put them in my remote control for Sony TV and they did not work. At first I thought my remote was broken because the batteries were brand new, but that wasn't the case. I replaced the batteries with energizers and the remote control worked fine. Then I checked to make sure I just didn't get a bad batch of Amazon batteries by putting the batteries in another device and they did work..... Very weird, but from my experience these Amazon batteries don't work in all devices.

name: Chuck
title: Works as well as name brand batteries for me
review: I like the ease of getting these. They seem to have a decent shelf life and work well in my stuff with good longevity and no real problems noted. Bought them a few times now.

name: Tony
title: Great Value
review: I have been buying Kirkland batteries from Costco, but now with Covid I'm trying to go less. Amazon batteries is a little bit more cheaper than Costco and I feel the quality is as good as Kirkland.

name: Amazon Don
title: Can't beat the price for decent performance.
review: I tested a few random batteries (out of a 36 pack) and they tested exactly the same as an 8 pack of Duracell that I picked up locally last week. Of course, these were much cheaper. The only thing that I found fault with is the lousy packaging and I'd only take 1/2 star off for that. Of course Amazon doesn't allow that, so I'll go with 5 stars and revise it down the road if they leak of fail in some way.

name: Mjo
title: Great price, long lasting.
review: So far so good!!! We go through batteries pretty quickly around my house. The price was good & so far they‚Äôve lasted in everything I‚Äôm using batteries for!

name: Gary ham
title: Great value just as good as energizers
review: We use the on our motion sensor lights! They are a great value longevity is great we have lots of kids walking through the hallways and up the stairs they are still bright after 2 weeks of use. They are super bright. Great for lower cabinets and under top cabinet lighting.

name: Jim Humphrey
title: Good batteries. Good price.
review: Good batteries that work well in devices like remotes and other low current devices. Haven‚Äôt had any problems with them at all. I will continue to order Amazon Basic batteries because they work well and inexpensive in quantity.

name: theresa g.
title: You can't get quality for this price
review: I used to run to store for batteries so often and especially around holidays. I have lots of candles and lanterns. I will never run out of batteries again! AMAZON IS THE ANSWER. Great for longevity and best price anywhere. Why would anyone shop anywhere else!!!

name: J. McLaughlin
title: Worthless
review: I put two of these into my wireless mouse and in one week they were dead. trying the other two now and not looking good for them either. don't waste your money on these, stick with Duracell.

name: Nikita
title: Better than store bought
review: Amazon batteries are well worth their value!!!! Longevity is longer than any other store bought batteries. I can buy a 36 pack of Aa's and AAA'S for less than $30 and they last all year, if not longer.

name: Chao Rong
title: BUY THIS INSTEAD
review: After years of buying Duracell's expensive batteries, I decided to switch over to this Amazon Basics one. It lasts 50 hours in my Xbox One controller and hundreds of hours in my mouse.

name: Zach Burks
title: You get what you pay for in life
review: These batteries are absolute crap the length of time that they last is abysmal at best I would just spend the extra dollar or to get Duracell or Energizer or another top brand I bought these twice and I've been very disappointed each time

name: aseriousloverofbooks
title: These have a great life span in my computer mouse
review: I've been very pleased with the long life of these batteries in my computer mouse. I've tried pretty much every other brand and they don't last. I bought these not expecting such good performance I just wanted a low priced battery and I am very pleasantly surprised.

name: tw
title: Failed too fast
review: I bought this pack one month ago. They are used to light LED lamps for no more 20 minutes a day. The batteries stopped working already. I am not buying them again.

name: Di
title: Handy
review: I go through batteries. I always keep small flashlights hanging on all the doors in my house. We get strong winds and when the electricity goes out you can always find a flashlight

name: Jencmar
title: Great Deal - Great Product
review: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. ¬†This is all I‚Äôm ordering from now on. We use these mostly for our indoor motion detector safety lights for my in- laws when they get up at night & can‚Äôt reach the light switch down the hall.

name: TerminallyAle
title: These worked well, until I had a 4pack that didn't work at all
review: I have had no bad experience with these batteries until now. These came packaged in a lot of smaller, 4 pack containers wrapped in plastic. I have now had two 4 packs in a row not work at all, so roughly 20% of the batteries I bought are not working. I still have a few to go, so that number may increase. Any savings I realized by buying these have essentially gone out the window. For reference these have a use by date of 10-2027, so well within the normal product lifetime.With that being said, the ones that did work worked well while they were in use.

name: Nikki Kutz
title: Save the packaging from your old batteries
review: You get the batteries but they come plastic wrapped in rows of 10 or so but they don't have any packaging for storing them. So, not totally what I expected. I haven't had them long enough to really test their "life expectancy" but they seem to work just fine.

name: D. at LLRC
title: BAD DEAL, THEY LEAK EVEN IN STORAGE NOT EVEN IN USE YET
review: These batteries leak BOTH on machines and just in plastic storage container. I have lost two finger OX2 monitors because this dam things leaked, and threw away 6 others that had not even be in any item.AS I FOUND OUT THESE ARE A BAD DEAL

name: Jennifer J.
title: Worth it!
review: 10 cents each!SeriouslyThey‚Äôre batteries!They‚Äôre half price name brand and seem to work just as well, I‚Äôll reorder one day, but not soon! I got 100 AAA!

name: Paul Feinberg
title: Why Buy other Brands? These do the same thing and are cheaper
review: These amazon basic batteries work great. I have had no problems with them. They come nicely packed, and seem no better of life than other name brands. We always purchase these.

name: John
title: Great value for the money
review: Very nice batteries. Work in the product real well was a lot better than going to the store and buying name brand batteries will you changed and use these all the time now.

name: RnR
title: Cost/Quality
review: The length of these batteries are great. I'll use these trom now on. It's a GREAT deal for your money. Can't go wrong. Try for yourself. Trust me.

name: Sara Jane Douglas
title: These work great and are super cheap!
review: I have NEVER before ordered batteries from Amazon, only bought them at the store, and this is amazing to be able to stock up as nothing is worse than running out of batteries at home when you need them the most :)

name: Johnny's girl

name: Amelia Hackett
title: terrible longevity

title: Amazon basics AAA batteries

name: Chris L. Sockman
title: Better than name brand batteries!

My son uses them in his game controllers and they last for several weeks at high usage, too.

name: David S.
title: Leaking batteries
review: I purchased these in June 2019 so it's past the return window.They are still in the packaging and are leaking badly.They are advertised having a 10 year shelf life!Since this happened to the unopened items already,I will be removing them from all items which they were installed.The expiration date is 01-2029

name: Jennifer
title: Great value!
review: They work just as good as "brand name bunny" but half the price! Highly recommend. My kids toys go through batteries quickly so this is a great option to save $!

name: bryan2103
title: Great value, they‚Äôve lasted longer than expected
review: These batteries have lasted a lot longer than I expected. I use them in my pocket flashlight, which I use a lot during the day. I think they‚Äôve been in my light for about 3 months now and haven‚Äôt had to change them yet.

name: Daniel
title: Value Pack was very affordable
review: I was sort of worried that since these batteries were such a low price that they wouldn‚Äôt last long but they seem to be lasting just as long as any other battery so I think they were a great value for the low price that I got them for and I would buy them again.

name: Mom
title: Very Short Life!

name: Pedro R.
title: Very affordable !
review: Love these batteries best price for good strong batteries and you get 3 packs enough to cover all my accessories that use the batteries i purchased happened to be triple As , happy customer I‚Äôll buy them again !

name: Tiffany
title: Great value!
review: I will never buy any other brand battery. These are great quality for thr price. They last just as long as the expensive batteries at the store.

name: Marcus
title: Have 75% less charge than other batteries

name: darklysewn
title: everyone needs extra batteries

name: Amazon Customer

It seems like the deadline is past due for my refund, so I'm leaving a 1 star review. If it's possible, I would like a refund for 40 batteries.

name: Kaitlyn
title: Good battery for a good price
review: They work just as good as other brands but are a much better price. In my remotes they lasted a couple months, in my kids toys they lasted as long as other brands we really couldn‚Äôt tell the difference.

name: B. Burn

review: These are great, especially if you have kids. We go through a lot of batteries in all the toys and remotes and buying these saves us money. They seem to last as long as the other brand name batteries out there.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Not worth it anymore.
review: We have bought these batteries for a couple years now. Our last two boxes haven‚Äôt lasted long at all. Our most recent box we‚Äôve had for a week and we‚Äôve had to change the remote control batteries twice now. As soon as we change the batteries the remote says battery low right from the start. I‚Äôm starting to lose faith in these batteries and don‚Äôt feel they‚Äôre worth it anymore.

name: barb0710
title: Great Value‚ÄºÔ∏è
review: Love the quantity and the durability of these batteries. We buy a box for ourselves and each of our adult children at Christmas time so that we are all ready with a supply for when our grandchildren come to visit and play with items needing fresh batteries. It helps mom & dad to keep a supply on hand at home also.

name: Sandra
title: do not last
review: Usually I buy duracell bateries and we all know how expensive those can be. I purchased this hoping to save some money but it ended up costing me more, This batteries do not last! They probably lasted 2 weeks before we needed to change them again, and I mean dead dead in 2 weeks. Would not recommended them.

name: dmoss58
title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
review: Do not buy these!!!!!!! Only about 4 were good. They are bad, bad, bad!!!!!!!

name: Brittany A

name: Schweetpea
title: nice packaging and good so far

name: GeekGirl
title: Have ordered several, and they always work
review: Absolutely no complaints at all. They are cheap, I can get them in bulk, and they have always worked. Would give more stars if I could.

name: mike ali
title: Not worth it

name: Lindsey
title: Works
review: This is my 1st purchase of amazon batteries. I just used the AAA for my wireless keyboard and it works.Not much to say with batteries üòÇ

name: TC
title: Battery cap exploded

Opened the battery cover and the top of the AAA battery had exploded off with battery acid leaking inside the mouse. I usually like Amazon Basic items but now I am a little wary and after reading similar reviews it seems like quality control is lacking at Amazon. Hey Jeff you might want to recheck those Blue Origin rockets.

name: Madi
title: AAA+
review: Seems great, not sure about longevity, but there's A LOT for a small price. Came neatly in a nice compact box, instead of a plastic casing so it pretty much comes in something you can store it in.

name: Rum Ham
title: Good life and value
review: These seem to be good batteries at a decent price. I saw a YouTube video on battery life/price and these performed well so I bought them. No complaints

name: Dr. A
title: Don‚Äôt waste your money
review: Straight out of the package at least 1/2 have been DOA. You wouldn‚Äôt know if you don‚Äôt use all the batteries at once but even unopened they shouldn‚Äôt start out dead.

name: Greg
title: They're batteries
review: Amazon batteries are cheaper than the big name brands, but much less in cost. we buy these in high volume and the price is crazy-low.

name: Kacy King
title: Horrible longevity
review: I bought these for my amazon firestick remote. I literally use the remote to open Disney+ and press play on a movie then put it away. Each set of 2 that I‚Äôve used has only last 3 days each.So irritating!

name: Jaime M. Martinez
title: Overall Great Value
review: Overall these batteries are a great value. I have purchased multiple packs of all battery sizes. I would give it 5 stars but unfortunately the last box of 36 i purchased had 3 completely dead/drained batteries right out of the box. This is the first time i had received any dead batteries.

name: David
title: Good value
review: Cheapest I could find. Seem to last for a while in remote controls and mouse. Good value for money. Have bought Amazon Basic batteries for a few years now with no problems.

name: Summer L.
title: Absolute JUNK!
review: Absolute JUNK! I love Amazon, but the batteries I received can‚Äôt even power a tv remote for an hour!? I‚Äôm actually shocked by how ridiculously horrible they are. I didn‚Äôt expect them to be fantastic or as good as name brand batteries, but I did expect them to be able to power something, and for longer than two seconds. The might as well have saved their money and just sent me empty boxes, because all buying them did was leave me with that much more garbage to throw out. I was forced to give them one star, but I would really not give them any at all.

name: M
title: Great price

name: trishadenise
title: Do not last!
review: These batteries don't last long enough to mustify the effort to put them in the device. I purchased the Amazon brand AAA and AA in bulk, and every device we have used them in lasts a few days, if that, before needing to be replaced. Ridiculous!

name: Kindle Customer jojo
title: Don't last very long.

name: TinaR
title: Batteries that I constantly use and need
review: Bought these batteries for some Christmas decorations I bought that needed the size. Have bought these before, I like the fact that I can get a large package for a good price

name: RJ
title: Decent battery with a good charge

name: Dyey
title: Good value
review: Good value battery best deal I could find. However I notice they dont last as long as other popular name brands. My mouse battery lasted only a month. But they work fine for the price.

name: Chris Tina
title: Landfill waste of money! Doesn‚Äôt last
review: Worst batteries ever! They do not last. Run through them like they don‚Äôt have juice. I have volt meter and most of them when they arrived were not at full capacity. I have ordered this item 3x and it is the same each time. I will not be ordering them again.

name: cayla
title: As good if not better than the expensive ones
review: I love these batteries! I‚Äôve got both AA and AAA and will never buy batteries anywhere else. Such a good deal for a lot of batteries and work just as good if not better than the expensive batteries like energizer etc.

name: Troms
title: Not great.  Seem inconsistent.
review: In my experience these are not great. They don‚Äôt seem to last very long, and they don‚Äôt seem to be consistent, battery to battery. They were really inexpensive.

name: Carolyn S. Striker
title: Batteries go dead within a year's time
review: These batteries were priced at a competitive price, but I am disappointed that now that it has been a year, the batteries I have not used yet show about 20% of their full potential, even though they have not been used and their expiration is 2025. I have never bought batteries that were almost dead within a year. So the price isn't as good when you can't use about 1/4 of the batteries.

name: Investigative Journalist
title: Batteries very hard to free
review: The cardboard shipping pack may be easy open, but freeing batteries from their shrink wrap can require tools and serious patience. Not likely to reorder.

name: Nero
title: Great with flashlights
review: I bought these for my headlamp and mini lanterns and they work great. Don't know the point of the 'remote control' rating if I ain't use them for that but I guess they'll do good for that too.

name: Phil Glatz
title: Excellent batteries, but packaging could use some improvement.
review: As good as any of the big name brands. Only complaint is the very difficult to remove plastic from each group of four batteries. Would have been much better to use a small band to keep them together; since they are in a tight cardboard box, it is unlikely they will short each other out, the band probably isn't even needed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor Battery Life
review: These batteries are terrible! I have purchased these in the past and never had a problem, so maybe it‚Äôs just a bad batch. But they last maybe 24 hours before having to be replaced. Even in a TV remote- they don‚Äôt last long. Dollar store batteries have lasted longer than these. Very disappointed.

name: Sunny
title: Great buy!
review: I'm only giving 4 stars because I haven't actually used any of these yet. But they are in three packages and make fun little thank you gifts. Like to my son in law who is always helping me with electronic problems. I will be buying more of these!

name: Kyle K.
title: They work
review: They are batteries and they work; however, I did find that my fire alarm truly did need energizer or duracell batteries. I figured a battery is a battery, but I was wrong. My alarm would go off randomly with these in it, but when I replaced it with energizer, everything was fine. Lesson learned. In all other cases they did the job.

name: Goviahuman
title: No brainer
review: These are very solid batteries for the price. I‚Äôm at a point where I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve used any other brand of batteries for years. It‚Äôs pretty much a no brainer now.

name: Michelle
title: These batteries get very HOT.
review: These batteries get very hot. VERY üî• Hot. I don't know if they're old but they do work however I'm afraid to use them in some devices because of the heat.

name: miss. literaura
title: I haven't had any issues with mine...
review: I use these in the remote for my firestick and I haven't had any of the problems other users have listed. I think it's a pretty good value for the money I spent and they arrived quickly. That was exactly what I needed as I just had run out of batteries when I purchased them.

name: Likeable
title: Short Timers
review: I have had to replace these in several devices. No more.

name: Angie Schuyler
title: Batteries
review: Batteries drain fast, great packaging, fast delivery.

name: Sheila
title: Great!
review: This is a perfect size for small usage of battery. The battery the selves works just fine and pretty durable compare to the other brands. Nice job, Amazon!

name: Mizbet
title: Good quality at a great price
review: I have these on hand always, so many household items need batteries and I am prepared. May try the rechargeables from Amazon next.

name: E.Contreras
title: Will buy again
review: Was a little hesitant to buy these with the reviews saying they leak...that has NOT been the case with these.They have worked perfectly and super cheap!Will buy again

name: Jessica
title: Buyer beware, may not work
review: They don't work for all things, ok for remote controls but not for children's toys. I would say don't but cheap batteries, but my Dollar Store batteries worked fine in the toys so I'd just say beware of buying Amazon Basic batteries.

name: Joseluis
title: Love the ergonomic feeling!
review: I'm a design student so I do a bunch of computer work and during these past few weeks of my fall semester I was starting to develop some wrist pain. I ordered this mouse because of its promises. So far I haven't felt any pain after three days of use and I say three because it sort of has a "feeling curve" to it since your used to your arm being face down but damn I swear this vertical handling of the mouse feels tons better!

name: Drew
title: Colossal Disappointment
review: Wow. What a colossal disappointment these turned out to be. I do not usually write reviews for products but after using these I really felt the need to come here and express the complete misrepresentation of these batteries that are being displayed on this page. I put two of these AAA batteries into my Roku remote on 11/20 and today is 12/7 and they are dead. They lasted a grand total of 17 days. Batteries that I put into remotes usually last for months at a time. Sometimes they last so long I think to myself, "damn these are lasting a long time." I have crummy no-name brand batteries in my regular TV remote right now, the ones that were originally included with the TV, and they are going on 4 years. If I bought Radioshack brand from Radioshack or Walmart brand (if they had one) from Walmart, then I would expect them to be cheap generic and would not expect much- but I actually expected quite a bit from Amazon. Amazon is supposed to be a respectable brand, they are, in fact, the largest retailer in the world. I expected them to be as good as Duracell or Energizer and you can think that that was silly or not silly but these things don't come within a mile of those brands, I would have been better off with those brands you see that copy the branding if Duracell and call themselves Durabell or whatever. Those last as long as these do. It's a damn shame too cause I liked the idea of getting all my future batteries from amazon.

Would it kill them to put a little pull tab on the packages like packs of gum have for the last 100 yrs?

name: Carolyn Mora
title: They died after two weeks.
review: I'm giving these one star because they did work for 12 days(not full days....just when the candles were on....maybe a three hour stretch each time.). I bought these for remote control candles on my tree. I've had good luck with AA Amazon rechargeable batteries, but heard rechargeables are nasty to the environment so I went with these. Well, after they died as though they were magically programmed to(all within 24 hours), my husband kindly went to our local hardware store and bought some good batteries. I'm now stuck with these. I don't want to waste my own and others time and energy sending them back, but I have to share that they were an awful batch. That's all. NOW, having written that I've had good luck with the rechargeables, I'm remembering that I recharge them every week during the season. For all I know they might be less than good as well :) . I've also been unable to find contact information to let Amazon know about the batteries....Two Lessons for the New Year.....1. For things that are available, shop small and local.2. Don't waste time trying to find contact information for Amazon.3. Sometimes it's OK to leave less than flattering reviews for items. It might help someone.OK...that was three.

name: Y. M. Collins
title: Good value, quick shipping
review: Package of batteries came in Amazon shipping box measuring 13‚Äù x 9.75‚Äú x 3 ‚Äú. Inside that box with bubble wrap was a smaller cardboard box measuring 5.75‚Äù x 6.128‚Äù x .75‚Äù. The batteries came in two cellophane wraps, 20 batteries in all ‚Äì 10 per wrapper.The AAA batteries measure 10.22mm in diameter and 44.22mm in length. Battery imprinted with Amazon basis. The battery is mostly silver accented with a green circle with a check mark inside. One of the ends of the battery has a little protruding button and is marked with a + sign. The other side of the battery is flat and marked with a minus sign. There are several descriptions and warnings printed on the battery. One of the messages with a black background states No mercury added with a note below that says Made in Indonesia with some more writing that looks like French. Also printed on the battery is a note reading ALKALINE BATTERY and below this, AAA/LR03/AM4 followed by 1.5V. There is some Chinese symbols as well. Another warning reads- May explode or leak if recharged, disposed of in fire, short circuited, or improperly inserted. Again this is followed with French writing. Also there are other warning labels, one with a small circle that has a line thru it, a small picture of a garbage can with a line thru it, and another small circle with arrows around a E.The battery fits in my small flashlight and powers up ok, but has not been in there long enough to test the longevity of the battery. Seems like a good value per battery if they last a while. I would purchase these again if they prove to last a reasonable time.
